body_html:
Hello,

Thanks for the info, I updated to v1.4 and tfdbg works for me.

However, there seems to be some unsupported features. When I ran with tfdbg> run -f has_inf_or_nan, my model diverged with a NaN.

However, I received the following error:

tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.NanLossDuringTrainingError: NaN loss during training. Exception ignored in: <bound method LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession.__del__ of <tensorflow.python.debug.wrappers.local_cli_wrapper.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession object at 0x7ff95630a6a0>> Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/lib/python3.4/site-packages/tensorflow/python/debug/wrappers/framework.py", line 705, in __del__ AttributeError: 'MonitoredSession' object has no attribute '__del__' .

Can you please guide me through this?
body_text:
Hello,
Thanks for the info, I updated to v1.4 and tfdbg works for me.
However, there seems to be some unsupported features. When I ran with tfdbg> run -f has_inf_or_nan, my model diverged with a NaN.
However, I received the following error:
tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.NanLossDuringTrainingError: NaN loss during training. Exception ignored in: <bound method LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession.__del__ of <tensorflow.python.debug.wrappers.local_cli_wrapper.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession object at 0x7ff95630a6a0>> Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/lib/python3.4/site-packages/tensorflow/python/debug/wrappers/framework.py", line 705, in __del__ AttributeError: 'MonitoredSession' object has no attribute '__del__' .
Can you please guide me through this?
body:
Hello,

Thanks for the info, I updated to v1.4 and `tfdbg` works for me.

However, there seems to be some unsupported features. When I ran with `tfdbg> run -f has_inf_or_nan`, my model diverged with a NaN. 

However, I received the following error:

`tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.NanLossDuringTrainingError: NaN loss during training.
Exception ignored in: <bound method LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession.__del__ of <tensorflow.python.debug.wrappers.local_cli_wrapper.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession object at 0x7ff95630a6a0>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3.4/site-packages/tensorflow/python/debug/wrappers/framework.py", line 705, in __del__
AttributeError: 'MonitoredSession' object has no attribute '__del__' `.

Can you please guide me through this?
